description:
go.crypto: remove cipher.Reset()

The go.crypto repo was missed when this function was removed from the
ciphers in the standard library.

messages.text:
Hello agl@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e94c385a2926&repo=crypto ***

go.crypto: remove cipher.Reset()

The go.crypto repo was missed when this function was removed from the
ciphers in the standard library.
